articles.title: Arctic ice carries heavy freight of plastic - Nature.com
articles.description: Many of the microplastic particles in northern sea ice originated thousands of kilometres to the south.
articles.content: Plants, algae and other photosynthetic organisms draw their carbon from carbon dioxide in Earths atmosphere. This process is catalysed by an enzyme called Rubisco, which works inefficiently at atmosp… [+993 chars]
